headline: Is Progressive (PGR) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Progressive (PGR) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
